alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:39AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN BANNOCK...NORTHEASTERN POWER AND SOUTH CENTRAL BINGHAM COUNTIES... There is moderate to heavy snow falling and has stalled over the Pocatello area currently. Expect another 1 to 2 inches of snow, possibly more if this band stays stalled over Pocatello. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, eastern American Falls Reservoir, Chubbuck, Inkom, Portneuf Gap, Fort Hall Buffalo Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Pocatello Airport, and Fort Hall Putnam Lodge. The snow can accumulate at a rate of one inch per hour or more in this area of heavy snow. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this area of heavy snow.

area.areaDesc: Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
